[b]Use a reputed media player that can play H.265 (HEVC : High Efficiency Video Coding) Video support.
Media Player Classic - Home Cinema and MPC-BE are recommended!.. VLC is OKay, but MPC variants are preferred.
VLC and players like latest GOM, KMP/PotP with LAV can play HEVC.

And also use latest K-Lite Codec Pack.

In Mobile, Android, Tabs, use a media player like VLC Player, MX Player... that can play H.265 :]
For more info, read the How_to_Play_ file inside the torrent.


Be aware that all HEVC rips will not play on any stand-alone device. You can only watch this on a computer or on devices which have HEVC support.
Be sure that you have the latest versions of VLC or Media Player Classic or SMPlayer. Earlier versions may not work[/b]
